text: Freedom of Choice is a 1980 album by Devo. It was their third studio album and contains their biggest hit Whip It. It went to number 22 in the United States, number 5 in Australia and number 9 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== 1993 Virgin Freedom of Choice/Oh, No! It's Devo CD bonus tracks: 2009 Warner Bros. CD bonus tracks: * These bonus tracks constitute the DEV-O Live EP. 2009 Ultra Devo-lux Ltd. Ed. CD bonus tracks: ==Notes== Category:1980 albums Category:Devo albums
title: Freedom of Choice
